text: Johannes Willem "Hans" van der Hoek (5 May 1933 - 4 February 2017) was a Dutch footballer. He was under contract at Feyenoord (1950-1960), SC Enschede (1960-1961), and ADO (1961-1962). He was born in Rotterdam, Netherlands. van der Hoek died in Rotterdam, Netherlands on 4 February 2017, aged 83.Oid-apeler Hans van der Hoek overleden ==References== ==Other websites== * Interlands van Hans van der Hoek op voetbalstats.nl Category:1933 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Footballers from Rotterdam
title: Hans van der Hoek
